Rich,
    This theme tsuba is in the book Sukashi Tsuba in European Collections by 
Kremers (pg 130).  The example in the book is 3 rd master Tadatora or a 
student of Tadatora, but it goes on to mention that there is a guard of similar 
design in Japan that is fifth master.  Just though you might want to know.

Lou
